Why can’t I move my medium widget to the bottom of the screen? I have a background where it’s like black at the top and white at the bottom and the widget picture is white so I wanna move it to the bottom so it blends in.

You are able to, but only if you have other widgets or apps above it. So, basically the widgets still arrange themselves automatically based on what is on that screen. So if you have 2 rows of apps on that screen, you should be able to drag your medium widget under that.
